（折り入って相談したいことがある……か。\n沙耶が俺に悩み相談なんて意外だな）:
(There's something she wants to discuss with me... huh?
It's surprising that Saya would talk to me about her worries.)
%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nわざわざお越し下さり、:
%usernameusernameuserna%-san.
Thank you for coming all this way.
いやいや、そんなに畏まる必要はないぞ？\n特別忙しいわけでもないしな。:
No, no, there's no need to be so afraid.
It's not like I'm particularly busy.
それにしても、わざわざこんな場所に呼び出すなんて、\nよほど重大な話なのか？:
Still, I didn't think she'd go out of her way to call me out here
Is it really that important?
お話の前に……せっかく茶室までおいでいただいたことですし、\nまずお茶を一服、い:
Before we talk... Since you came all the way to the tea room,
Would you like a cup of tea first?
もしかして、沙耶が淹れてくれるのか？: Could Saya be making it for me?
はい。まだ修行中の身ではありますが、\n精一杯おもてなしさせていただきます。:
Yes. I'm still training, but...
I'll do my best to entertain you.
（茶を点てる沙耶……様になっているな。\n早々に足が痺れかけてる俺とは大違いだ）:
(It looks like... Saya is making tea.
She's so different from me, whose legs are starting to go numb right away.)
実は俺、お茶の作法はよくわからないんだが。: Actually, I don't know much about tea etiquette.
スカラの多くの方々がそのように仰います。\nですが、どうかお気になさらず。:
Many Scaras say so.
But please, don't worry about it.
厳しく堅苦しい型のみが、茶の道ではございません。: Only strict and formal forms are not the way of tea.
もてなす側と、お客様……互いが相手を思いやり、\nこうして向き合うひと時に感謝を:
The hospitality side and the guests... They're both considerate of each other.
I show my gratitude for the time we spent facing each other like this...
大切なのは型ではなく、心の持ちようなのです。: It's not the shape that's important, it's the mentality.
うーん。やっぱり俺には難しい話だ。: Hmm. It really is difficult for me.
ふふふっ。\n難しく考えず、いつも通りで結構ですよ。:
Heheheh.
Don't think too hard about it. Just act like you always do.
普段から人を気遣ってくださっている、\n%usernameusernameuse:
She's always looking out for people.
If it's you, %usernameusernameuserna%, that's enough.
そんな当たり前のことでいいのか？: Is it really okay to do something so obvious?
ええ。それから、足は崩していただいて構いません。\n立ち上がった時に転ばれては大:
Yes. Also, I don't mind if you lose your leg.
It would be terrible if you fell over when you stood up.
バレてたか……\nあまり慣れないことはするもんじゃないな。:
So they found out...
I shouldn't do things I'm not used to.
しかし沙耶は姿勢はもちろんだけど、\n道具の扱い方や所作ひとつ取っても綺麗だな。:
However, Saya's posture was, of course,
It's pretty even if you take care of the tools and mannerisms.
紫雲家は由緒ある茶道の宗家。\n私も幼い頃より学んで参りましたので。:
The Shiun family was the head family of tea ceremony with a long history.
I've learned it since I was a child.
そういえば、どうして沙耶はスカラ校舎に入学したんだ？\nこう言っていいものかわか:
Come to think of it, why did Saya enroll in the Scara school building?
I don't know if it's okay to say this, but Scara...
校風に合わない……と思われますか？: Do you think it doesn't suit the school's style?
ああ。スカラ校舎は乱暴というか、大雑把というか……\n沙耶のイメージと違うし、柊:
Yeah. The Scara school building is rough, or rough...
It wasn't like Saya's image, and the Hiiragi school building was no good?
確かにアマツの出自を持つ私であれば、\n柊校舎への所属を選択するのが正道でしょう:
Certainly, if I were from Amatsu,
Choosing to belong to the Hiiragi building would be the correct course of action.
ですが、私は敢えて正道からかけ離れた環境に\n身を置きたかったのです。:
However, I dared to venture into an environment far removed from the path of righteousness
I wanted to put myself on the line.
多種多様な人材の集う、このスカラ校舎において、\n紫雲家の名はなんの意味も力も持:
In this Scara school building, where a wide variety of people gather,
The name of the Shiun family has no meaning or power.
家名も伝手も頼らず、私個人の力でどこまでやっていけるのか。\nそれを確かめたかっ:
How far can I go on my own without relying on my family name or help?
That's what I wanted to confirm.
自分に厳しくあるための選択なんだな。: It's a choice to be strict with yourself.
ええ。ここは己を律するに相応しい場所です。: Yes. This is a place worthy of discipline.
――では、粗茶でございますが、お召し上がりください。: —Well then, it is coarse tea, but please enjoy it.
へえ……いい香りだな。\nそれじゃ早速いただきます。:
Wow... It smells nice.
Well then, let's dig in.
お服加減はいかがですか？\n苦すぎなければ良いのですが。:
How are you feeling about your clothes?
I hope it's not too bitter.
俺にはお茶の善し悪しはわからないけど、美味いよ。\n沙耶の淹れてくれたものだから:
I don't know how good or bad tea is, but it's good.
Maybe it was because Saya had made it for me.
でも、お茶をご馳走するためだけに呼んだわけじゃないだろ？\n悩み事って、かなり言:
But you didn't call me here just to treat me to tea, did you?
Sounds like it's pretty hard to say what's bothering you.
……っ。\nどうして、私の悩みがお話ししづらいことだと……？:
......!
Why do you think my worries are hard to talk about...?
最初に用件を聞いた時、はぐらかされた感じがしたからな。\nそれに、こうしてお茶を:
The first time I heard what I needed to do, it felt like I'd been dodged.
Besides, the reason you made tea like this is because you want to mentally prepare yourself, right?
なんでもお見通しなのですね……\nさすがの洞察力です。:
You can see right through me...
That's insight for you.
沙耶が躊躇するほどなんて、一体どんな悩みなんだ？: What kind of trouble could Saya be so hesitant about?
実は……ＭＧの操縦に関わる問題なのですが……: Actually... It's a problem related to MG piloting...
技術者やチームメイトじゃなく、俺にＭＧのことを？\n力になれるといいんだが。:
You're not talking about engineers or teammates, but MG to me?
I hope I can help.
仲間と試せる限りのことは試しましたが、改善が見られず……\nあなたの力をお借りで:
I tried everything I could with my friends, but I didn't see any improvement...
I wish to borrow your power.
……結構深刻みたいだな。\nわかった。詳しく話を聞こう。:
...Looks pretty serious.
All right. Let's hear the details.
お疲れ様、沙耶。\nひと通りＭＧの動作は見させてもらった。:
Good work, Saya.
I've seen MG movements for the most part.
ありがとうございます。\nそれで、あなたの目から見て如何だったでしょうか。:
Thank you very much.
So, how did it look to you?
確かに沙耶の言っていた通りだ。\n以前と比べて、無駄な動きが増えているな。:
It was definitely just like Saya had said.
Compared to before, her movements are more pointless.
やはり……どうすればいいのでしょうか。: As I thought... What should I do?
（俺には沙耶自身が抑制しているように見えたが……\n自覚がないのか？ 気付かない:
(To me, it looked like Saya herself was suppressing it, but...)
Are you not aware of it? Are you pretending not to notice?)
カオスメイデンのみんなとの連携に影響は？: Does it affect our cooperation with everyone in Chaos Maiden?
今のところ問題にはなっていません。\n確認いただいた挙動の遅れは、誤差の範囲内で:
So far, it hasn't been a problem.
The delay you confirmed is within the margin of error.
はい。例え訓練や競技への影響が少なくとも、\nスカラのトップチームの一員としては:
Yes. Even if the impact on training and competition is at least...
As a member of Scara's top team, I can't tolerate it.
うーん……ひとまず、校舎を散歩でもするか。\n少し付き合ってくれ。:
Hmm... I guess I'll take a walk around the school for now.
Come with me for a bit.
えっ？\nあ、あの、あなたから何かご助言は……？:
Huh?
U-Um, do you have any advice...?
気分転換も必要だろ。\nその辺を歩きながら話そう。:
You need a change of pace, too.
Let's talk while walking around.
状況判断には問題はなかったはず……\nであれば、やはり反応速度のわずかな遅れが…:
There shouldn't have been any problems with the situation...
If that's the case, then the slight delay in reaction time is...
（ずっと下を向いてぶつくさ言ってる……\nこれじゃ気分転換にならないな）:
(He keeps looking down and grumbling...)
This isn't a change of pace.)
なあ、沙耶。\n今、何か我慢してることはないか？:
Hey, Saya.
Is there anything you're holding back right now?
本当はチームメンバーに言いたいことがあるとか、\n機体の作りや整備具合に不満があ:
She said she actually had something to say to the team members
I heard they're dissatisfied with the construction and maintenance of the aircraft.
実は体重を気にして甘いものを我慢してるとか、\n俺の態度に不満があるとか、そんな:
Minoru was worried about his weight and was holding back on sweets, or something like that
It doesn't matter if you're dissatisfied with my attitude or something.
えぇっ！？ と、とんでもありません。\nそのようなことは決して……:
Whaaat?! Th-That's crazy.
I would never do such a thing...
あ、あの……どうして突然そのような話を？: U-Umm... Why are you bringing that up all of a sudden?
俺には、さっきＭＧを操縦してる沙耶が何かを我慢して、\n自分を抑えこんでいるよう:
To me, Saya, who was piloting the MG earlier, was holding back something
He looked like he was suppressing himself.
やっぱり、本当は思い当たる節があったんだな。\nでも見て見ぬふりをしてたってとこ:
I guess she really did have something in mind.
But you were pretending not to see it?
……%usernameusernameuserna%さんは、\n私の事をなんでも:
...%usernameusernameuserna%-san...
You see right through me, don't you?
なんでもってことはない。\n頼まれた通り、沙耶のことをしっかり見てたから気付いた:
It's nothing.
I only realized it because I had a good look at Saya, just like she asked me to.
そ、そうですか……\nそれでも、こうもあっさり気づかれてしまうとは……:
I-I see...
Even so, I didn't think she'd notice so easily...
沙耶自身にとっても向き合いにくいことみたいだから、\n無理にとは言わないが……で:
It seemed like it would be hard for Saya herself to face, so...
I won't force you, but... If possible, could you tell me?
……実は……私は楽しんでしまっているのです。\nＭＧに乗って戦うことを。:
...Actually... I'm having fun.
To ride MGs and fight.
適性を持つ者の責務を果たす。己を律し、道を究める。\n両親の前では、そのように口:
I will fulfill the duty of those with aptitude. I will discipline myself and master my path.
Even though she said that in front of her parents...
心の奥底では戦いを求め、力を振るうことを楽しんでしまうのです。\nもっと、己の力:
Deep down, you seek battle, and you enjoy wielding your power.
He wanted to show off his power more...
自分自身の中にある衝動……ってところか。: I guess it's an impulse inside me.
スカラ校舎への入学を選択したのも、\n認めたくはありませんが……内心わかっていた:
She'd also chosen to enroll in the Scara school building
I don't want to admit it, but... I knew it on the inside.
この自由な環境ならば、はばかりなく戦えるから……と。: In this free environment, I can fight without hesitation...
沙耶はそんな自分の衝動が怖いんだな。: Saya must be afraid of that impulse of hers.
内なる欲求は、今もなお膨らみ続けています。\nより過激に……いずれ自制しきれなく:
My inner desires are still growing.
More radically... To the point where I feel like I won't be able to control myself any longer...
本能的な欲求と、それを抑え込もうとする理性のぶつかり合いが、\nＭＧの操縦に問題:
The clash of instinctive desire and reason trying to suppress it
So it created problems with MG piloting, huh?
理性では冷静に操縦しようとはしているのです。\nですが、状況の改善には至らず……:
My rational mind is trying to control it calmly.
However, it didn't improve the situation...
……堪えてだめなら、いっそ全部出し切ってみるか？: ...If you can't take it anymore, why don't we just let it all out?
出し切る……？\nま、まさか、この内なる衝動をですか？:
Cum...?
D-Don't tell me you have this inner urge?
そ、そのようなはしたないこと、\n紫雲家を担う者として許されるわけが……！:
Th-That's so vulgar,
As the bearer of the Shiun family, there's no way I can be forgiven...!
だけど、戦いを楽しむ気持ちだって沙耶自身のものだろ？\n見ないふりをしていても、:
But the feeling of enjoying a fight is also Saya's own, isn't it?
Pretending not to see it wouldn't solve the problem.
無理に抑え込もうとするんじゃなく、一度解放してみるんだ。\nその衝動も沙耶の一部:
Instead of trying to suppress it by force, let it go once.
Acknowledging and understanding that that impulse is also a part of Saya.
ちゃんと自分の心と向き合って理解できれば、\n制御だって可能かもしれないだろ？:
If I can properly face and understand my own heart,
It might even be possible to control it, right?
自らを律するために必要な過程、と考えるのですね……: You think it's a necessary process to control yourself...
難しいかもしれないが、俺は沙耶ならやれると思う。\n今からもう一度、試してみない:
It might be difficult, but I think Saya can do it.
Why don't we try it again?
……わかりました。\n%usernameusernameuserna%さんの助言:
...Understood.
I'll take your advice and give it a try.
自分の心を表に出す……\n己自身と、今一度向き合うために……:
Showing your own heart...
In order to face myself once more...
押さえつけるのではなく、思うがままに――いざ。: Instead of holding her down, I just do what I want――Now.
――っ！ こんな、笑うなど……い、いえ！\n御そうとするのではなく、解放するのが:
――! I can't believe I'm laughing like this......n-no!
My current goal is not to control her, but to free her...
早速、機体のバランスが崩れてる……\n考えすぎるな、沙耶！:
The balance of the aircraft is already off...
Don't overthink it, Saya!
大事なのは型じゃなくて心の持ちようだって、\n茶の席で俺に教えてくれただろ！:
What's important isn't the mold, it's the way you feel.
You told me at the tea party!
心……\n戦いに臨む、私自身の心は……:
Kokoro...
As I face battle, my own heart...
（……動きから迷いが消えた？\nしかし……なんて無茶な戦い方だ）:
(...The hesitation vanished from her movements?
Still... what a reckless way to fight.)
（これを本当に制御しきれるのか？\n沙耶は……いや、信じるしかない）:
(Can you really control this?
Saya... No, I have no choice but to believe in her.)
そうです……！ 私は、ようやく思い出しました！\nああ、この昂りを……！:
That's right...! I finally remembered!
Ahh, this excitement...!
初めてＭＧに乗った日の、あの高揚感！\nそして、初めて武器を振るった時の快感を！:
That exhilaration from the first day I rode MG!
And the pleasure of the first time I swung my weapon!
ああ、なんて素晴らしい！\n……だからこそ、もっともっと、制御しなければ！:
Oh, how wonderful!
...That's why I have to control it more and more!
この快感を！ この昂りを！ この高揚を！\nもっと、私のものにするために！:
This pleasure! This excitement! This exhilaration!
To make you mine more!
おお、徐々に動きが洗練されている……\n沙耶、自分の衝動をコントロールできたんだ:
Ooh, her movements are getting more refined...
Saya, you were able to control your own impulses...!
%usernameusernameuserna%さん、いかがでしょう？\n枷を解:
%usernameusernameuserna%, what do you think?
My MG dance, freed from its shackles.
ふふ、ありがとうございます。\n……はぁ、なるほど……これが必要な境地でしたのね:
Heehee. Thank you very much.
*sigh* I see... So this is what it takes.
ああ。俺も想定してなかったが……凄かったぞ。: Yeah. I didn't expect that either, but... it was amazing.
己の衝動と理性……この二つのバランスこそが大切なのですね。\n%username:
My own impulses and reason... These two balances are important.
I realized it thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%-san.
ふふ、それも一つの形ですわね……\nそうして恐れられるのも、どこか嬉しいのです。:
Heehee. That's one way to put it...
There's something about being feared that makes me happy.
きっと、それも沙耶なんだろうな。\n……でも、俺はそんな沙耶もいいと思うぞ？:
I'm sure that's Saya too.
...But I think that's fine with you, Saya.
ふふ、ありがとうございます。\nそう言っていただけるのなら……後悔はありませんわ:
Heehee. Thank you very much.
If you say so... I have no regrets.
ただ、己を押さえつけるだけでもない\nそして、無理に己を隠すわけでもない。:
He's not just holding himself down.
And she wasn't forcing herself to hide herself.
己に向き合い、その上で飼いならす。\nそれこそが、私が必要としていたものなのです:
He faced himself, and tamed him on top of that.
That's exactly what I needed.
沙耶、シミュレーターでの訓練は満足出来たか？: Saya, are you satisfied with your training in the simulator?
ええ、ありがとうございます。\nこれも%usernameusernameuser:
Yes, thank you very much.
This is all thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%-san's advice.
そのアドバイスだって、沙耶に教わった言葉を\n俺なりに噛み砕いて伝えただけだ。:
Even that advice was based on the words Saya had taught her
I just chewed through it in my own way.
俺はただちょっと背中を押しただけさ。\n全部、沙耶の力だよ。:
All I did was give her a little push.
It was all Saya's power.
あのっ……答えを得たとはいえ、私もまだまだ未熟な身です。\nできれば引き続き助言:
Umm... I may have obtained an answer, but I'm still inexperienced.
If possible, I'd like you to continue giving me advice...
この先の道のりでも、また背中を押していただけますか？: Will you give me another push on the road ahead?
俺でよければ、いつでも力になるよ。: If you're okay with me, I'm always here to help.
あ、ありがとうございます。では……\nこれからも近くで、私の背を見守っていてくだ:
Th-Thank you very much. Then...
Please stay close and watch over me from now on.
